| Transport   |               |             |        |

From statement 4, we know the person eating papaya is on the left or right of the person driving the ship. Since the person driving the ship is not yet placed, we'll come back to this statement later.

From statement 2, we know the person driving the scooter is not to the right of the person driving the car. Since the scooter driver is already in column 1, the car driver must be in column 3:

|             | Scooter     | Almond-milk |   Radish |
